body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Scott Garcia and the customer's name is Ann Phillips.  The conversation is about Strolid Motors (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for calling Bright Solutions. My name is Sarah. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Sarah, I'm looking for some help with my recent order.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course, I can help you with that. May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my name is John Doe.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. Can you please provide me with your order number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's three four five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. Can I also have the email address associated with your account?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. I have all the information I need. I will look into your order and get back to you shortly.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, John. Thank you for your time. Have a great day!
